'''Kanten Senmyou Blessing''' is [[Kamisato Ayaka]]'s [[4th Ascension Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*Despite the wording, Ayaka does not have to apply Cryo with her dash, only hit an enemy.
*The [[Stamina]] refunded (10) is the same as its [[Kamisato Art: Senho|activation stamina consumption]], allowing her to break even on stamina cost if no movement was done outside of the initial activation.
